27 #ifndef DUEROS_DCS_SDK_DCS_SDK_INCLUDE_ERROR_TYPES_H
28 #define DUEROS_DCS_SDK_DCS_SDK_INCLUDE_ERROR_TYPES_H
29 
30 #include <ostream>
31 
32 namespace duerOSDcsSDK {
33 namespace sdkInterfaces {
34 
42 enum class ErrorType {
50  MEDIA_ERROR_UNKNOWN,
51 
59  MEDIA_ERROR_INVALID_REQUEST,
60 
68  MEDIA_ERROR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE,
69 
77  MEDIA_ERROR_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
78 
86  MEDIA_ERROR_INTERNAL_DEVICE_ERROR
87 };
88 
100 inline std::string errorTypeToString(ErrorType errorType) {
101  switch (errorType) {
102  case ErrorType::MEDIA_ERROR_UNKNOWN:
103  return "MEDIA_ERROR_UNKNOWN";
104  case ErrorType::MEDIA_ERROR_INVALID_REQUEST:
105  return "MEDIA_ERROR_INVALID_REQUEST";
106  case ErrorType::MEDIA_ERROR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE:
107  return "MEDIA_ERROR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE";
108  case ErrorType::MEDIA_ERROR_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR:
109  return "MEDIA_ERROR_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR";
110  case ErrorType::MEDIA_ERROR_INTERNAL_DEVICE_ERROR:
111  return "MEDIA_ERROR_INTERNAL_DEVICE_ERROR";
112  }
113  return "unknown ErrorType";
114 }
115 
129 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const ErrorType& errorType) {
130  return stream << errorTypeToString(errorType);
131 }
132 
133 } // namespace sdkInterfaces
134 } // namespace duerOSDcsSDK
135 
136 #endif // DUEROS_DCS_SDK_DCS_SDK_INCLUDE_ERROR_TYPES_H
